election_record.label: New York 1817 State Senate, Eastern District

sub_unit.name: Clinton
sub_unit.note: Henry Yates, Jr. received 4 votes as Henry Yates.
The New York Columbian lists 343 votes for Henry Yates, Jr.

sub_unit.name: Essex
sub_unit.note: Henry Yates, Jr. received 3 votes as Henry Yates.
The Northern Post and the New York Columbian list 430 votes for Roger Skinner.

sub_unit.name: Jefferson
sub_unit.note: Henry Yates, Jr. received 9 votes as Henry Yates.
Anthony J. Blanchard received 1 vote as Anthony Blanchard.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: Henry Yates, Jr. received 2 votes as Henry Yates.
Anthony J. Blanchard received 1 vote as Anthony Blanchard.
Nehemiah Cande received 1 vote as Nehemiah Canda.
The Northern Post lists 1666 votes for Samuel Young.
The Northern Post lists 1616 votes for Roger Skinner, 1629 votes for Henry Yates, Jr., 1626 votes for Samuel Young, and 1215 votes for Samuel Stewart.
The Albany Argus (Albany, NY) and the Cabinet list 1616 votes for Roger Skinner and 1216 votes for Samuel Stewart.

sub_unit.name: Rensselaer
sub_unit.note: Anthony J. Blanchard received 4 votes as Anthony Blanchard.
Nehemiah Cande received 1 vote as Neemie Cande.
Simeon Ford received 1 vote as Simon Ford.

sub_unit.name: Saint Lawrence
sub_unit.note: Henry Yates, Jr. received 57 votes as Henry Yates.

sub_unit.name: Saratoga
sub_unit.note: Henry Yates, Jr. received 1 vote as Henry Yates.
Anthony J. Blanchard received 1 vote as Anthony Blanchard and 3 votes as Anthony L. Blanchard.
Samuel Young received 1 vote as Samuel Youngs.
The Northern Post and the New York Columbian list 522 votes for Nehemiah Cande.
The Official Canvass of Votes lists 1134 votes for Roger Skinner and 884 votes for Samuel Young but the town totals add up to 1101 and 918.

sub_unit.name: Warren
sub_unit.note: The Official Canvass of Votes lists 273 votes for Samuel Young though the original election returns list 284 votes.

sub_unit.name: Caldwell
sub_unit.note: The Northern Post lists 33 votes for Roger Skinner.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: Henry Yates, Jr. received 61 votes as Henry Yates.

sub_unit.name: Whitehall
sub_unit.note: The Northern Post lists 59 votes for Henry Yates, Jr.

election_record.reference: The New-York Columbian (New York, NY). May 8, 1817.
The Independent American (Ballston Spa, NY). May 14, 1817.
The New-York Columbian (New York, NY). May 15, 1817.
